html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-10702024-10-04DFO
ActFisheries Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Quebec Fishery Regulations, 1990
PrecisRegulations Amending the QUEBEC FISHERY REGULATIONS, 1990 in order to (1) include a new definition of sport fishing centred on recreational or personal use; (2) change fishing gear or equipment requirements through variation orders; (3) amend licence conditions and to Atlantic salmon tagging provisions to accommodate licences purchased online, and to registration requirements of Atlantic salmon; (4) add provisions on baitfish, including expanding existing possession prohibitions; and (5) make technical changes to respond to comments from the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0198 Publication Date: 2024-10-23
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the QUEBEC FISHERY REGULATIONS, 1990 in order to (1) include a new definition of sport fishing centred on recreational or personal use; (2) change fishing gear or equipment requirements through variation orders; (3) amend licence conditions and to Atlantic salmon tagging provisions to accommodate licences purchased online, and to registration requirements of Atlantic salmon; (4) add provisions on baitfish, including expanding existing possession prohibitions; and (5) make technical changes to respond to comments from the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations.
